trans.title: Technology transfer
trans.text: We are the bridge between the Polytechnic National Institute community and the industrial, private, public, and social sectors. The main goal is to commercialize the knowledge generated by research groups.

protection.title: Protection of intellectual property
protection.text: Process to generate the legal protection models in the technological developments of the Institute with commercial potential.
protection.lista: Cutting edge tecnology is studied to identify the intellectual property.

commerce.title: Commercialization of Technology
commerce.text: The resources used to sell or transfer the license or exchange its technologies, its intellectual property assets, and its technological packages.
commerce.lista: Portfolio of technologies with intellectual property.

management.title: Management of R & D
management.text: Process for the identification of practices or procedures for technological commercialization.
